评论概述: Almost too small-no more xmas cookies
评论详情: I bought two dresses in this style, the solid peacock blue and the black leafy pattern. Both are great. I didn’t pay attention to the difference in fabrics when ordering. The black leafy is mostly cotton, with unlined skirt. Fits a little snug on my hips, and has less give for movement (in the shoulders especially) than the solid color that is mostly polyester. But I love it. The solid peacock blue fits great, too, and the fabric is not restrictive. That skirt is lined. I was going to choose one to keep, but may need both in my closet as I really can’t decide which I prefer. I ordered size M as suggested. Body size: 5’5”, @135lbs, hourglass shape, a little bottom heavy-thicker in hips/thighs.
Beautiful and true to size!!

I got my usual small with this company and it fits a little bit loose in the waist but they don’t offer extra small, which I wish they would but small still looks OK on me. This dress came to me with no wrinkles and maybe just a few folds in it because they neatly fold this dress to perfection before placing it in a bag. I appreciate that. This is one of my favorite dresses! I have it in multiple colors and patterns. The fabric is nice and stretchy, it's comfortable enough to wear all day, and it's flattering to my pear shape! The colors are vibrant, and I machine wash it and it still looks good! I think it is a sturdy and well made item!

I needed a "little black dress" to wear to an upcoming wedding and came across this dress. I absolutely loved the style and cut of the neckline. I didn't have high hope when I ordered since it was so cheap, but I figured I'd give it a shot. And I wasnt disappointed! Seems to fit true to size and material is stretchy so it hugs your curves just the right amount! And the neckline is pretty and flattering. I may order this dress in a couple more colors :)  My pic isn't the greatest but for reference, I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly. I'm about 5'2, 122lbs, 36 bust, 30 waist, 39 hip. The length falls just below my knee.

评论概述: Good flattering fit but odd shape

This dress is a light fabric but with good quality. Because of the light fabric, it is a great summer dress for work. I cannot talk enough about how great the style of this dress is. I originally bought it in gray, and now bought it in green.
always get compliments. love the retro style.  kind of stretchy, which makes it so easy to get on and off. Pink only.  I have black one as well and no stretch.

评论概述: Wore for my Graduation, it was perfect!
评论详情: This dress is classy, comfortable, and looks great! I wore it to my graduation and I could probably also wear it to a cocktail party, especially with some different shoes and jewelry. Everyone complimented me on it, and the size was spot on based on Amazon's size guide. The fabric is a nice weight and feels surprisingly high quality for the price.

I purchased this dress for church. It’s cute but it’s not the best quality and after one wash, it will definitely have to be dry cleaned to get back to its original look because trying to iron this will be a job. It runs a bit small so if you want wiggle room, size up if you just must have it. For reference, I am 5’3 and 134 pounds. I ordered a small.

I love the style and really like the pattern. L was too small in the hips. There is absolutely no stretch but I think thats good for camouflaging my midsection. I'll return and try XL. I also ordered same style in navy blue XL. It has stretch and fit pretty well but all of my midsection "flaws" were too obvious. A body shaper did not help. I had to return.
I really like this dress. The fit is great and the Freda print is fantastic.
Fit was way too tight, I had to return it.

I am 5’4”, between 110-115 lbs., and a B cup.  I did have to exchange the first one I received because there was an unusual height from the Empire waistline upwards up the shoulder.  The second dress I received did not have the disproportionate height in the shoulders. The pattern does not line up between all the pieces exactly, but nobody cared or noticed except me, lol. It would be nice though, if the company took a little bit more care to line up the pattern as they did in the example photo.  So, that is the only reason that I would give this one less star. However, for the price and style you get what you pay for. Oh, and, I did not put in an a dryer so I couldn’t tell you if it shrinks any. I wouldn’t do that anyways because then it fades the fabric faster. I did not have to iron it though.  I wore it to a day wedding with a an evening reception.  All I did was parrot with a satin jacket to dress it up for the night.
Luv these vintage-type dresses. This medium fits perfect on my 5', 132 lbs body. It falls right below the knees.

So aside from the poor lighting in the one photo, the dress came in very wrinkled. It feels more like a tablecloth at a mid rated restaurant, and the zipper feels like it will not last. The color is nice though. I like the length on me (I am 5’ 9” and it comes to about my knees). I do not like how the top is fitted. Too much room in the armpit/bust area, and it leaves this weird gap of extra fabric. The dress has some stretch, but I feel sizing down to address the top of the dress would have made it too tight. Photos are with the dress right out of the bag. Now I am stuck trying to decide if it is worth keeping and trying to get out the wrinkles and fit it better. The idea is really adorable, and I was really hoping for better.
